Package org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.event

Contains the necessary APIs for observing plugins and readers (used by ticketing applications).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ObservablePlugin
    Provides the API to observe readers in plugins.
    ObservablePlugin.PluginObserver
    This interface has to be implemented by plugin observers.
    ObservableReader
    Provides the API to observe Secure Elements in readers.
    ObservableReader.ReaderObserver
    This interface has to be implemented by reader observers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDefaultSelectionsRequest
    This abstract class defines the POJO used to carry the default selection request data.
    AbstractDefaultSelectionsResponse
    This abstract class defines the POJO used to carry the response to a default selection request.
    PluginEvent
    This POJO is used to propagate a change of reader state in an ObservablePlugin.
    ReaderEvent
    This POJO is used to propagate a change of a SE state in an ObservableReader.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ObservableReader.NotificationMode
    Indicates the expected behavior when processing a default selection.
    ObservableReader.PollingMode
    Indicates the action to be taken after processing a SE.
    PluginEvent.EventType
    The two types of reader event
    ReaderEvent.EventType
    The different types of reader events, reflecting the status of the reader regarding the presence of a Secure Element.

Package org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.event Description

Contains the necessary APIs for observing plugins and readers (used by ticketing applications).

It mainly contains the interfaces of the observable elements and the associated transport POJOs.

The API for observing the plugins is defined by the interface ObservablePlugin and generates events PluginEvent.

The API for observing the readers is defined by the interface ObservableReader and generates events ReaderEvent.
The implementation of the abstract POJO classes AbstractDefaultSelectionsRequest and AbstractDefaultSelectionsResponse is provided by Keyple in the package org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.message.

Since:
0.9
